column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH:  A suspected drunk driver crashed at around 2.10 am on Sunday
column6: near Wat Botum.------A white Camry driving at speed hit motorbikes
column7: and a parked car outside Mer Khmek restaurant. The car first hit a motorcycle on the street and crashed
column8: apparently while trying to leave the scene.------Six people were reported to be injured
column9: two seriously (*other reports say one).------Â Authorities took the driver and vehicle to  Phnom Penh Road Traffic Bureau pending further investigation. ------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
